title: Layered Waldorf salad
ingredients: ['125g walnut pieces', '1 large head green leaf lettuce, sliced into bite-size chunks', '350g chopped celery', '450g red seedless grapes, halved', '2 large red apples, cut into small chunks', '45g blue cheese, crumbled', 'Dressing', '180ml plain yogurt', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
